Question
========
In a study on explanations for the school choice of (the parents of) students leaving primary education, 200 (randomly drawn) parents were surveyed. The questionnaire includes questions on religion (two categories), ethnic background (three categories) and socioeconomic status (three categories). The questionnaire also includes 25 questions on the importance parents attach to different characteristics of the secondary school. The questions make it possible to determine parents' demandingness (1 = not demanding to 10 = very demanding).

The research question is: Do parents, typified by religious, ethnic and socioeconomic status, differ in the degree of demandingness?

Which of the following methods of analysis is most appropriate for answering this research question?

Answerlist
----------
* One-way ANOVA
* Multiple-way ANOVA
* One-way ANCOVA
* Multi-way ANCOVA
